attributes.action: Change the hours of the congestion charge back to pre Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
If the government wish to kickstart the economy in central London, reducing the congestion charge back to what it was pre Covid-19 is a no brainer. 
Businesses are dying a slow death.
attributes.background:
Make the congestion charge 5 days a week from 7am-6pm.
Weekends must be excluded.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the London Mayor's Office and Transport for London, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

Prevent local authorities imposing congestion charges outside 6am-7pm Mon-Fri: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330925
